This is a tracking bug for parallelism opportunities.

Discussion of particular opportunities belongs in bugs blocking this one.

Discussion about general architecture belongs in mozilla.dev.platform.

I'll be posting there momentarily with a summary of a discussion forom this morning.  A photo of the whiteboard from that discussion is attached.
